15.0: Therefore behold I will seduce her…I will persuade or appease her to draw her after me. And what is the seduction and the leading into the wilderness?  Exile which will be like a wilderness and a draught to her, and there she will do tshuvah (return her heart) for it is better when she does My will than when she rebels against Me.”

0.0: 1. Shomron is made guilty- at this point, her guilt will be revealed.
0.1: 2. the pregnant women in her midst

3.0: 1. Assyria will not save us- Even more say before Him that we don't want any help from man. Not from Assyria. Not from Egypt.
3.1: 2. On a horse we will not ride- This refers to the assistance of Egypt that they sent horses. Like it says in Isiah 50. and we will no longer say
3.2: 3. To the works of our hands- ie our gods/idols
3.3: 4. Because with You- and only You rests the hope for mercy on orphans
